com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc
Interface AsyncCallback<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChainedCallback
public interface AsyncCallback<T>

Simple interface for asnchrnous callbacks provided for GWT compatibilty (matches the corresponding GWT interface).
